snippet.title: BEAST - Early Access Teaser
snippet.description:
BEAST opens Early Access through Steam on October 25th 2023!

We’re also that day launching our Content Creator Program through Lurkit

Learn more about what it all means and sign up here: https://bit.ly/BeastEarlyAccess

Unleash the BEAST here: https://bit.ly/BeastSteam

Facebook https://www.facebook.com/beastvideogame
Twitter https://twitter.com/BEAST_videogame
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/beast_videogame
WWW https://www.falseprophet.dev/
Discord https://discord.gg/beastvideogame 

#BeastVideoGame #TurnBased #RPG #Tactical #Indiegames
